title: Unboxing the HP OMEN 45L frozen in a block of ice!!!!
description: PLEASE SUBSCRIBE:  GET MY PINK iJUSTINE CABLES HERE:   GET MY EDITING PLUGIN:    MUSIC I USE -   FRIEND ME HERE:        MY NEW PROJECT:   PODCAST:       WHAT I USE TO MAKE VIDEOS    CAMERAS: Sony a7 IV -  Sony a1 -   Sony a7s III -   Insta 360 ONE X3 -  Insta 360 ONE RS -  Insta 360 GO2 -   LENSES: New Sony GM 24-70mm ii -  Older Sony GM 24-70mm -  New Sony Sony 20-70mm -  Sony GM 16-35mm -  Sony GM 50mm -  Sony GM 135mm -  Sony GM 85mm -   AUDIO:  Sennheiser AVX Digital Wireless -  Sony XLR Adapter -  Sony Hot Shoe Shotgun -  Tiny Sony Microphone -  DJI Mics -  Rode Podcaster Pro II -  Podcaster Mic -  Elgato Wave 3 Mic -   DRONES: DJI Mavic 3 -  DJI Mini 3 -  DJI Air 2S -   LIGHTING: Aputure 600d Pro -  Aputure Light Dome II -  Aputure Amaran 200d -  Aputure 35in Light Dome -  Aputure Lantern Softbox -   Sony CF Express A 160g + Card Reader-  Sony CF Express A 800g -     These links are affiliate and by using them youre helping out my channel! Thank you!     BECOME A CHANNEL MEMBER:
transcript: (lively music) - What is this? Okay, so I'm supposed to be doing an unboxing of the new HP OMEN. This is not a box. I mean, it is a box. How am I gonna get this out of here? Okay, I can't even move this. I can't believe that they froze a computer in a block of ice. (laughs) This is fantastic. This might be the coolest unboxing that I've ever done, all puns intended. Congrats on receiving your metaphor, now get to melting. Okay, so first of all, a huge thank you to HP for sponsoring this video. They were like, "Justine, we'd love for you to review our new HP OMEN 45 Liter with new Cryo cooling," and I was like, "Cool, great. Love it." And when they told me that the delivery was happening this morning, this is not what I expected! So I guess we need to get the computer out before we unbox, set it up to do the review. Okay. (flamethrower hissing) Oh my goodness! (Justine laughs) What? I'm so happy. This incredible. (lively music) I gotta take a break. My finger hurts from flaming. - [Man] Well, that was fun, but it's still frozen. (laughs) - This is a little gift that I just got. It's a little tiny chainsaw. (chainsaw whirring) I need some safety glasses. (funky music) (chainsaw whirring) Look at that! (chainsaw whirring) Okay, so now I see how ice sculpting can be really fun. Like, this is... (laughs) Oh man, we're so close. I'm gonna just get this whole chunk off right here. (chainsaw whirring) It seems as though things are happening. (chainsaw whirring) (chisel scraping) Oh, look at that. (chisel scrapping) Oh! (laughs) I need like a shield. (hammer thudding) Oh man! Oh! (laughs) I got an idea. (ice clinking) Save that for a nice drink later. Oh, that did nothing. That did nothing. (hammer thudding) Oh, that did something! (ice crunching) (Justine gasps) (ice crunching) (Justine laughs) Did you see those quick feet? I'm gonna get my gloves. (ice thudding) I got it. I got it. We're good. We're good. We're good, everyone. Everyone, everyone, everything's fine. Everything's fine. Okay, well, the ice is removed. I think I can just lift this out of here. (Justine straining) There's mini ice skating rink for ants. I have plenty. (lively music) So as you can see, I have everything all set up. That was probably one of the most fun unboxings that I've ever done. I actually had to change my clothes because everything was completely soaking wet from the ice that had melted. So now that we're here, it's all set up. I have a bunch of games installed. And with this new Cryo Chamber, this is allowing this new HP OMEN 45 Liter desktop to be one of the most queen efficient machines that HP has ever made. So the first thing that you're gonna notice is this PC definitely has a very different look and that's because they have the new Cryo Chamber up on top here. And that's gonna be giving you so much more space inside of the chassis, where normally you would have the entire cooling system. But they've done a really great job of kind of integrating it into the top and kind of making it look like a piece of art; not only looks cool, but it's actually efficiently cooling this entire PC as you use it. And this is really exciting especially for people who are doing a lot of processor intensive things. Maybe you're a big gamer, or you're doing video editing, or you're doing 3D rendering, whatever it is; if it is something that is processor intensive, you obviously do want a machine that is efficiently being cooled, thus giving you better performance. And as someone who has overclocked their PCs in the past, this Cryo Chamber is enabling the best overclocking with their prebuilt systems. The OMEN 45L is powered by the 12th Gen Intel Core i9 processor with a new hybrid architecture that matches the right core for the right workload. So background tasks won't interrupt anything that you're actually doing on your computer at that time. Whether it's playing video games or exporting a video, this will be able make sure that you're running at peak performance at all times. Another thing that you'll notice is because the Cryo Chamber is housing a lot of the cooling properties, the inside chassis of this leaves you so much more space for customizing and upgrading. So as you can see, this cable management is also pretty impressive. All I know is if I was in charge of this cable management, it would look like my office, and that's not a good thing. So the 45L has maximum thermals for maximum performance, and this can fit up to an NVIDIA 3090. It has 120 watt Intel CPU. You can install up to 64 gigs of RAM and up to 2 TB PCI NVMe SSDs with direct storage. It supports Intel Cryo technology. It's got plenty of overclocking headroom and capabilities. Obviously it has incredible RGB lights, which is one of the things that I'm a huge fan of, and they're also customizable. This is cool 'cause I can actually see my monitor and my desktop, and this will allow me to customize all of the colors and how I want the lights to perform. If I interact with each piece, it'll change the colors and how they react to various situations. You could definitely play with this for hours. There are honestly endless patterns and colors and combinations that you can make, but I think I'm just gonna keep it a static pink for the rest of this video. You can tell them at bottom that they have some higher feet, which this will help out with more air intake. So they clearly are taking all things cooling into consideration. It also has this really nice removable dust filter right here on the front, and that's super easy to get access to. I love that you're able to access the internals from both sides of the machine. So there is a little button over here on the back that will give you access to the backside of it. And this little glass front piece is also accessible from the front. I love that they really took into consideration that people nowadays, like, we're not just buying these pre-built computers and leaving them. It's so easy to do solid-state upgrades and RAM upgrades. So basically buying a really nice pre-built machine, especially something like this with so much room for upgrades, is kind of the way to go now. Obviously, yes, building from scratch is pretty fun; but for most people, I feel like this is the perfect solution. So I was also talking about the customizable LEDs. And this is really cool.
